song.englishname: Fairest (Fairest Lord Jesus) - New Life Worship

english.segment1: Verse 1. Fairest Lord Jesus, Ruler of all nature. O Thou of God and man, the Son. Thee will I cherish, Thee will I honor. Thou, my soul's glory, joy and crown.
english.segment2: Verse 2: Fair are the meadows, fairer still the woodlands. Robed in the blooming garb of spring;. Jesus is fairer, Jesus is purer. Who makes the woeful heart to sing.
english.segment3: . CHANNEL: You are fairer still, today. You are fairer still, today. Precious Jesus, Lord, You are adored. As we worship, as we worship
english.segment5: . Verse 3: Fair is the sunshine, fairer still the moonlight, And all the twinkling starry host;. Jesus shines brighter, Jesus shines purer. Than all the angels heav'n can boast.
english.segment6: Verse 4: Beautiful Savior! Lord of the nations!. Son of God and Son of man!. Glory and honor, praise, adoration. Now and forevermore be Thine!
